SEARCH
Package au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.encoding

Class QuantityEncoding

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.encoding.QuantityEncoding
public class QuantityEncoding extends Object
Object encoders/decoders for FHIRPath Quantity values.

Provides conversion between FhirPathQuantity objects and Spark SQL Row representation.

Author:
Piotr Szul

    • encodeLiteral

      @Nonnull public static Column encodeLiteral(@Nonnull FhirPathQuantity quantity)
      Encodes the quantity as a literal column that includes appropriate canonicalization.
      Parameters:
      quantity - the quantity to encode.
      Returns:
      the column with the literal representation of the quantity.

    • encodeNumeric

      @Nonnull public static Column encodeNumeric(@Nonnull Column numericColumn)
      Encodes a numeric column as a quantity with unit "1" in the UCUM system. Returns a fully null struct when the input is null to ensure FHIRPath empty collection semantics.
      Parameters:
      numericColumn - the numeric column to encode
      Returns:
      the column with the representation of the quantity, or fully null struct if input is null

    • encode

      @Nonnull public static Row encode(@Nonnull FhirPathQuantity quantity)
      Encodes a FhirPathQuantity to a Row representation.

      This method converts a FhirPathQuantity into the Row representation used by Spark. It handles canonicalization for both UCUM units and calendar duration units.

      Parameters:
      quantity - the FhirPathQuantity to encode
      Returns:
      the Row representation of the quantity
